raw_lines: Variant is I20 - SPORTZ VTVT BSIV

(C) Add-On Cover.label: (D) Own Damage Premium after Discount (A - B + C)

whats_covered.title: Accidents
whats_covered.description: Covers repair/replacement costs if your car is damaged in an accident.

whats_covered.title: Fire
whats_covered.description: Covers the damages caused due to self-ignition, explosion or lightning.

whats_covered.title: Theft
whats_covered.description: If your car is stolen, we will pay you the value of your car as per your policy.

whats_covered.title: Calamities
whats_covered.description: We will cover damage caused by natural or man-made calamities such as earthquakes, riots, etc.

whats_covered.title: Rat bite damages
whats_covered.description: Cover the damages caused by rat bites.

whats_covered.title: Third-party injury/death
whats_covered.description: We provide coverage for death/ injuries caused to individuals outside of your vehicle in accidents involving your car.

whats_covered.title: Third-party property
whats_covered.description: We also cover any damage/loss to third-party property.

whats_not_covered.title: Non-Accident Damages
whats_not_covered.description: Excludes coverage for natural wear and tear of parts like tyres, tubes, and engine.

whats_not_covered.title: Commercial Usage of the Car
whats_not_covered.description: Excludes coverage for damages incurred while using car for commercial purposes (e.g. deliveries, transportation for a fee).

whats_not_covered.title: Pre-existing Damages
whats_not_covered.description: Excludes coverage for any damage that was already present before the purchase of the policy.

whats_not_covered.title: Illegal Driving
whats_not_covered.description: This refers to any violation of traffic laws, such as driving without a valid license or driving under the influence of drugs, alcohol, etc.

(C) Add-On Cover.label: (D) Own Damage Premium after Discount (A - B + C)

whats_covered.title: Accidents
whats_covered.description: Covers repair/replacement costs if your car is damaged in an accident.

whats_covered.title: Fire
whats_covered.description: Covers the damages caused due to self-ignition, explosion or lightning.

whats_covered.title: Theft
whats_covered.description: If your car is stolen, we will pay you the value of your car as per your policy.

whats_covered.title: Calamities
whats_covered.description: We will cover damage caused by natural or man-made calamities such as earthquakes, riots, etc.

whats_covered.title: Rat bite damages
whats_covered.description: Cover the damages caused by rat bites.

whats_covered.title: Third-party injury/death
whats_covered.description: We provide coverage for death/ injuries caused to individuals outside of your vehicle in accidents involving your car.

whats_covered.title: Third-party property
whats_covered.description: We also cover any damage/loss to third-party property.

whats_covered.title: Zero Depreciation
whats_covered.description: Covers total cost of parts replaced, due to loss or damage to the insured vehicle, without any deduction towards depreciation

whats_not_covered.title: Non-Accident Damages
whats_not_covered.description: Excludes coverage for natural wear and tear of parts like tyres, tubes, and engine.

whats_not_covered.title: Commercial Usage of the Car
whats_not_covered.description: Excludes coverage for damages incurred while using car for commercial purposes (e.g. deliveries, transportation for a fee).

whats_not_covered.title: Pre-existing Damages
whats_not_covered.description: Excludes coverage for any damage that was already present before the purchase of the policy.

whats_not_covered.title: Illegal Driving
whats_not_covered.description: This refers to any violation of traffic laws, such as driving without a valid license or driving under the influence of drugs, alcohol, etc.

whats_covered.title: Third-party injury/death
whats_covered.description: We provide coverage for death/ injuries caused to individuals outside of your vehicle in accidents involving your car.

whats_covered.title: Third-party property
whats_covered.description: We also cover any damage/loss to third-party property.

whats_not_covered.title: Own car damages
whats_not_covered.description: Damages to your own car are not covered.
